SolveLamentConfiguration_SecondsToCharge.Description: The time it takes to solve the lament configuration

SolveLamentConfiguration_SkillCheckDurat.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the skill check if triggered

SolveLamentConfiguration_SkillCheckChanc.Description: % chance to trigger a skill check. This is rolled every second during the interaction

SolveLamentConfiguration_SkillCheckSucce.Description: The % length of the skill check zone

SolveLamentConfiguration_SkillCheckBonus.Description: The % length of the great skill check zone
% of progress awarded for suceeding a great skill check

TeleportToLamentConfiguration_SecondsToC.Description: The time it takes for the teleport to lament configuration interaction to take to complete.

EscapeLamentConfigurationGasp_SecondsToC.Description: The time it takes to break free from the chains that latch onto the Survivor once the Killer teleports to the Lament Configuration.
